Posts.Content: I had a mastectomy 2 weeks ago and implant fitted , grade 2 cancer size 15mm . I thought I was over the worst and about to get back on with my life but after seeing the consultant on Wednesday was told the MRI didn't show another lump which was 45mm and there was cancer in the first lymph node that had been removed ,i have lobular cancer but thought the MRI would be able to detect all the cancer just wondering if any one else has had this happen as I now feel I am back to square one. I am having a lymph clearance on Thursday followed by a ct scan and bone scan and will need radiotherapy and maybe chemo, my main concern is will the radiotherapy after the implant because I am very pleased with the result .
Posts.Title: after mastectomy found more cancer in breast tissue

Posts.Content: Hi  I hope all goes well for you , its good to know this does happen to other people as I always thought an MRI scan was failproof.
Posts.Title: after mastectomy found more cancer in breast tissue

Posts.Content: Hi, I was going to a lumpectomy and the MRI showed 2 more very small lumps that's why I had to have a mastectomy its a good job I did. Hope all goes well for you.
Posts.Title: after mastectomy found more cancer in breast tissue

Posts.Content: Hi I'm amazed how everyone is different , I will need radiotherapy and maybe chemo and all the lymph nodes removed.
Posts.Title: after mastectomy found more cancer in breast tissue

Posts.Content: Thank you, just get the first one done.
Posts.Title: advice on giving injections after chemo

Posts.Content: Thank you,yes they said they retract bit worried about my husband being heavy handed but I'm sure it will be fine.
Posts.Title: advice on giving injections after chemo

Posts.Content: Hi I have just had my first round of chemo and have a needle phobia and small veins so have had a picc line inserted which is fine. I will have to start injecting Nivestim today for 5 days and I don't think I will be able to so my Husband will try , has anyone any tips? Thank you Lulu
Posts.Title: advice on giving injections after chemo

Posts.Content: oh well done,very brave it must be very hard on your own.
Posts.Title: advice on giving injections after chemo

Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply I feel much more confident now.
